title: JSON schema of Apify Actor output schema

actorOutputSchemaVersion.description: The version of the output schema. It's a required integer field with a minimum and maximum value of 1.
actorOutputSchemaVersion.x-intellij-html-description: The version of the output schema. It's a required integer field with a minimum and maximum value of 1.
actorOutputSchemaVersion.markdownDescription: The version of the output schema. It's a required integer field with a minimum and maximum value of 1.

description.description: A string that provides a description for the output schema. This text is displayed in the Output user interface.
description.x-intellij-html-description: A string that provides a description for the output schema. This text is displayed in the Output user interface.
description.markdownDescription: A string that provides a description for the output schema. This text is displayed in the Output user interface.

title.description: A string that provides a title for the output schema.
title.x-intellij-html-description: A string that provides a title for the output schema.
title.markdownDescription: A string that provides a title for the output schema.

title.description: A string that provides a title for the specific output property.
title.x-intellij-html-description: A string that provides a title for the specific output property.
title.markdownDescription: A string that provides a title for the specific output property.

type.description: The data type of the output property's value. The schema constrains this to the string literal "string", which is a required field. The output value is always a URL, thus a string.
type.x-intellij-html-description: The data type of the output property's value. The schema constrains this to the string literal "string", which is a required field. The output value is always a URL, thus a string.
type.markdownDescription: The data type of the output property's value. The schema constrains this to the string literal "string", which is a required field. The output value is always a URL, thus a string.

description.description: A string that provides a description for the specific output property.
description.x-intellij-html-description: A string that provides a description for the specific output property.
description.markdownDescription: A string that provides a description for the specific output property.

template.description: A required string that defines how the output value (a URL) is constructed. It can use text formatting with {{variable}} placeholders.
template.x-intellij-html-description: A required string that defines how the output value (a URL) is constructed. It can use text formatting with {{variable}} placeholders.
template.markdownDescription: A required string that defines how the output value (a URL) is constructed. It can use text formatting with `{{variable}}` placeholders.

patternProperties.description: An object defining a single output property. It must contain the type and template attributes. It can also include title, description, and resourceType.
patternProperties.x-intellij-html-description: An object defining a single output property. It must contain the type and template attributes. It can also include title, description, and resourceType.
patternProperties.markdownDescription: An object defining a single output property. It must contain the `type` and `template` attributes. It can also include `title`, `description`, and `resourceType`.

properties.description: This is a required object that defines the output properties of the Actor. Its keys are the names of the output properties, and its values are objects that define each property's schema.
properties.x-intellij-html-description: This is a required object that defines the output properties of the Actor. Its keys are the names of the output properties, and its values are objects that define each property's schema.
properties.markdownDescription: This is a required object that defines the output properties of the Actor. Its keys are the names of the output properties, and its values are objects that define each property's schema.
